directions: Spray a large nonstick skillet with nonstick cooking spray.  Add oil, and heat over a medium flame.  Add onion and mushrooms.  Cook, stirring frequently, for 3 to 5 minutes, until tender.

Add tomatoes, tomato sauce, water, sugar, and spices to skillet.  When mixture begins to boil, stir in pasta.  Cover, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook 20 minutes.  Stir mixture every 4 to 5 minutes while cooking.
title: One Pot Pasta
